heading: Sunday Night
text: Clear south of route 2, partly cloudy north. Lows from 5 to 15 below zero. Northwest wind becoming light and variable.

heading: Monday
text: A few clouds in the northeast in the morning, then mostly sunny skies. Not as cold. Highs from the teens in the north, increasing into the 20s in the Connecticut and Champlain River Valleys. Light northwest wind.

heading: Monday Night
text: Mostly clear. Lows from near to 10 below, up to 15 below in the cold hollows.
